DOC.brief_summary: This study test hypothesis certain parenting style associate great non-adherence therapy child teens type 1 diabetes . To test hypothesis , investigator use standardize validated questionnaire parent child determine : parenting style ( investigator measure parental strictness , parental attachment , parental monitoring ) , parent ability cope stress , parent comfort parent role , parent child level depression parent perception financial resource . The investigator also measure parent child 's perception child 's underlying temperament parent-child conflict . The investigator correlate finding parent child subjective measure adherence therapy . The investigator also obtain objective measure therapy adherence include : HbA1c , number hospitalization diabetes ketoacidosis number miss outpatient appointment . These measure correlate finding .
DOC.brief_title: Impaired Family Dynamics Leads Non Compliance Type I Diabetes
